name: Asteroid Gardens
description:
It's finally here. It's your big chance! You and your friends can become asteroid gardeners. Come live a life of gardening, discovery and adventure!

----

Asteroid Garden - a multiplayer game about tending plants, exploring space, and building connections.

Made with Ink and Firebase for the InkJam2020. You can also play it from https://inkmud1.web.app/
